definition: to take care (of)/to control/to manage/to be in charge of/to look after/to run/to care about/tube/pipe/woodwind/classifier for tube-shaped objects/particle similar to 把[ba3] in 管...叫 constructions/writing brush/(coll.) to/towards

sentences.english: It is prohibited delivering explosives and detonators in same wagon.
sentences.chinese: 炸藥和雷管嚴禁同車運送。

sentences.english: There is a cavum in the hammerhead for the connection of detonator and the detonating cord.
sentences.chinese: 槍頭內部設有空腔，爲方便雷管與導爆索之間的連接。

sentences.english: After this human beings take over and defuse and remove the mine.
sentences.chinese: 然後便由人類接手，拆去雷管並移除地雷。

sentences.english: The detonators can be configured to respond, universally, to a broadcast address or signal.
sentences.chinese: 可配置的雷管迴應，普遍，一個廣播地址或信號。

sentences.english: We stuff explosive inside, then a detonator.
sentences.chinese: 我們往裏面填滿炸藥，然後裝上一根雷管。

sentences.english: There is a box of blasting caps in the shed over there, so be careful.
sentences.chinese: 那邊的小屋裏有一箱起爆雷管，當心點兒。

sentences.english: The continuous velocity of detonation of industrial detonators is determined by using Ni -Cr wire transducers.
sentences.chinese: 本文通過外阻絲傳感器測試了工業雷管連續爆轟速度。

sentences.english: The police later found the detonator.
sentences.chinese: 警方後來找到了這根遙控雷管。

sentences.english: Antisympathetic detonation of detonators in package is analyzed in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 對包裝件中雷管的防殉爆問題進行了分析。

sentences.english: TNT sticks are used as detonators.
A new non primary explosive electric detonator with only high explosive adopted was introduced in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種只採用猛炸藥的非起爆藥電雷管。

sentences.english: Investigations are conducted on the firing reliability of mining detonators.
sentences.chinese: 對礦用雷管發火可靠度進行了研究。

sentences.english: He outwitted the gallows by biting a percussion cap and blowing off his head.
sentences.chinese: 他嘴咬雷管炸掉了自己的頭，而免除了絞刑。
安全型長延期導爆管雷管。

sentences.english: Before the connection of detonator, the oxidizing layer or the core of lead-wire should be erased by abrasive cloth.
sentences.chinese: 磁電雷管連接前應用砂布擦掉腳線線芯部分的氧化層。

sentences.english: This paper analyzes the influences of processing and shapes of plastic stopper on the quality of electric detonator.
sentences.chinese: 分析了塑料塞體的加工及其形狀對電雷管質量的影響。
